gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: IWC tables of estimates of abundances

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The aim of the tables of âAcceptedâ Abundance Estimates is (i) to collate information in a consistent way on abundance estimates accepted by the Scientific Committee for various purposes and (ii) to provide a simplified table of abundance estimates suitable as a broad overview for the Commission and the public. See IWC 2014 (JCRM 15 suppl. p416-7) for further details on the objectives.

gmd:keyword.gmx:Anchor: Marine Environmental Data and Information Network

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: GEMET - INSPIRE themes, version 1.0
SeaDataNet P021 parameter discovery vocabulary

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: Data can only be used for scientific and educational purposes. A description of those purposes should be given when the data are requested

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Data need to be requested through email to statistics.iwc.int
